# waldur Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    waldur = {
      source = "waldur/waldur"
    }
  }
}

# Option 1: Configure explicitly
provider "waldur" {
  endpoint = "https://waldur.example.com/api/"
  token    = "your-api-token"
}

# Option 2: Use environment variables
# export WALDUR_API_URL="https://waldur.example.com/api/"
# export WALDUR_ACCESS_TOKEN="your-api-token"
# 
# provider "waldur" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `endpoint` (String) Waldur API endpoint URL. Can also be set via the `WALDUR_API_URL` environment variable.
- `token` (String, Sensitive) API authentication token. Can also be set via the `WALDUR_ACCESS_TOKEN` environment variable.
